com.gensym.jgi
Interface G2JavaStubClassReflectionProvider

public interface G2JavaStubClassReflectionProvider

A G2JavaStubClassReflectionProvider provides data for G2 when it wishes to create stubs that represent Java Classes.

Method Summary
 Sequence findDependentClasses(String class_name, Class clazz, boolean recurse)
          Return a sequence containing the names of the java classes that clazz is dependant on, including dependant hierarchy and method parameters.
 Structure getG2StubDetailsForJavaClass(String className, Class theClass, Symbol G2ClassName, boolean recurse, boolean forBeanWrapper)
          Return information enabling G2 to build G2 stubs that allow access to a named Java class methods and constructors
 

Method Detail

getG2StubDetailsForJavaClass

public Structure getG2StubDetailsForJavaClass(String className,
                                              Class theClass,
                                              Symbol G2ClassName,
                                              boolean recurse,
                                              boolean forBeanWrapper)
                                       throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                              G2StubCreationException
Return information enabling G2 to build G2 stubs that allow access to a named Java class methods and constructors
Throws:
ClassNotFoundException - The java class could not be found
G2StubCreationException - An error occured whil creating the G2 stub information

                                     Class clazz,
                                     boolean recurse)
                              throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                     G2StubCreationException
Return a sequence containing the names of the java classes that clazz is dependant on, including dependant hierarchy and method parameters.
